mapper.select: select bno, btitle, bwriter, bhitcount, bdate from boards order by bno desc

select eno, bno, btitle, bwriter, bhitcount, bdate from( select ROWNUM AS eno, bno, btitle, bwriter, bhitcount, bdate from (select bno, btitle, bwriter, bhitcount, bdate from boards order by bno desc) where ROWNUM <= #{endRowNo}) where eno >= #{startRowNo}
mapper.insert: insert into boards (bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bdate, bhitcount) values (bno_seq.nextval, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter}, sysdate, 0)
